author: Francisco Rodrigues
title: Russia’s Largest Bank Sberbank Launches Structured Bonds Tied to Bitcoin
description: The structured product gives exposure to BTC price changes and USD/RUB exchange shifts.
content:
Sberbank, Russias largest bank, has introduced a new structured bond that tracks the price of bitcoin 
 and the dollar-to-ruble exchange rate.Initially available over the counter to a limited pool o… [+872 chars]
